membership_plans.name: Explorer
membership_plans.description: Includes a €25 setup fee, €15 starting credit, 24/7* access, usage of all workshops, online training, and storage options. Free reservation: 2 hours/week.

membership_plans.name: Maker
membership_plans.description: Includes a €25 setup fee, €15 starting credit, €30 monthly credit, 15% machine discount, 24/7* access, usage of all workshops, online training, and storage options. Free reservation: 6 hours/week.

membership_plans.name: Pro
membership_plans.description: Includes a €25 setup fee, €15 starting credit, €75 monthly credit, 30% machine discount, 24/7* access, usage of all workshops, online training, and storage options. Free reservation: 12 hours/week.
